main event: A cigar-shaped object approximately 60-70 feet long was sighted hovering at about 100-150 feet in altitude in Dayton, Ohio on August 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object was observed to be solid and metal without any visible means of propulsion., The object shot away towards the south at an extremely rapid rate of speed after being observed., The sighting occurred at 1335 hours and lasted for about 2 minutes., Witness claimed with certainty that it was not a conventional aircraft., The report includes two photographs of the sighting.
witness description: 38-year-old male mechanic with a background in studying WW2.
